item.title: Using Latex With Hakyll
item.description: Since Hakyll is tightly integrated with Pandoc, it’s easy to use LaTeX with Hakyll by enabling Pandoc’s LaTeX compile features. Most explanations I found online, like this one, seem to be quite outdated though and they don’t work verbatim. The basic idea still is to set up a custom pandoc compiler using the pandocCompilerWith :: ReaderOptions -> WriterOptions -> Compiler (Item String) function, but the internals used in the WriterOptions have changed.
